forum.content:
我之前住在美國十年
I lived in the states for 10 years.

我遇到了來自世界各地的人
I've met people from around the world

也藉著聊天時更改錯誤協助他們學習英文
and helped them with their English
by having conversation with them while correcting errors.

我一開始英文完全不好
My English wasn't great at all in the beginning

不過我遇到了一群台裔美國人
but I met a group of ABT (American born Taiwanese)

他們很好心的用英文和他們有限的中文與我交流，同時讓我用中文回應
who were kind enough to help me by talking to me in English and the limited Chinese they knew, while I respond in Chinese

當我對於他們所說的英文有問題時，
也幫助我了解
and helped me understand what they were saying in English when I had questions.

我想要將這份好意傳下去 （用中文說好怪哈哈）
I'd like to pay the kindness forward.

所以如果你想要練習英文並得到更正
So if any of you would like to practice your English and be corrected,

歡迎你加我好友~
Go ahead and send me a friend request 🤗

為使這文互動化
To make this post interactive,

在下方留言一段簡短的自我介紹 [跟/或] 任何與英文相關的事情 (用英文或中文都可以)
comment below with a short introduction about yourself and/or anything related to the English language 🙂 (either in English or Chinese)

(如果你想要被更正或翻譯
在留言最後放個🙋🏻‍♂️或🙋🏻)
(Put a 🙋🏻‍♂️or 🙋🏻 in the end to indicated that you'd like to be corrected or translated)

我只是時間很多哈哈
P.s. I just have a lot of time on my hand haha
forum.title: 來聊聊吧🤓 I'm bored and wanna make a difference 🙃
